thm divalglem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 = { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((s1[×]c2)[+]s0))}

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)

  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 = { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((s1[×]c2)[+]s0))}, c2 ≠ 0)
  eqriv(hs0, c0, { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((s1[×]c2)[+]s0))})

  pm5.32i(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c2[||](c1[-]hs0), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((s1[×]c2)[+]hs0)))
  bitrd(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c2[||](c1[-]hs0), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, c1 =((s1[×]c2)[+]hs0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(s1[×]c2)=(c1[-]hs0)))
  sylancr(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (c2[||](c1[-]hs0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(s1[×]c2)=(c1[-]hs0))), c2 ∈ ℤ, (c1[-]hs0)∈ ℤ)

  syl2an(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, s1 ∈ ℤ, ((c1[-]hs0)=(s1[×]c2)↔((s1[×]c2)[+]hs0)= c1), hs0 ∈ ℂ, (s1[×]c2)∈ ℂ)
  nn0cn(hs0)

  mp3an1(hs0 ∈ ℂ, (s1[×]c2)∈ ℂ, ((c1[-]hs0)=(s1[×]c2)↔(hs0[+](s1[×]c2))= c1), c1 ∈ ℂ)

blocks.name: divalg
blocks.content: The division algorithm (theorem). Dividing an integer ` N ` by a nonzero integer ` D ` produces a (unique) quotient ` q ` and a unique remainder ` 0 <_ r < ( abs `` D ) ` . Theorem 1.14 in [ApostolNT] p. 19. The proof does not use ` / ` or ` |_ ` or ` mod ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)

blocks.name: ndvdsadd
blocks.content: Corollary of the division algorithm. If an integer ` D ` greater than ` 1 ` divides ` N ` , then it does not divide any of ` N + 1 ` , ` N + 2 ` ... ` N + ( D - 1 ) ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndvdsadd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wa(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wi(wbr(c1, cdvds, c0), wn(wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, c2)))))
} = {
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wa(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wbr(c1, cdvds, c0), wn(wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, caddc, c2))), wn(wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)))))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wa(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wi(wbr(c1, cdvds, c0), wn(wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2))))), wa(wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cn), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c2), clt, c1)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn), wa(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cn), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c2), clt, c1)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c1, cn), wa(wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cn), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c2), clt, c1))
  anasss(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cn))
  sylbi(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cn), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c2))))

blocks.name: ndvdsp1
blocks.content: Special case of ~ ndvdsadd . If an integer ` D ` greater than ` 1 ` divides ` N ` , it does not divide ` N + 1 ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)

blocks.name: ndvdsi
blocks.content: A quick test for non-divisibility. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndvdsi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wn(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cn)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn)
  -| wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, c3), c1)
  -| wbr(c3, clt, c0)
} = {
  mtbi(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, c3)))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, c3))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, cmul, c2)))
  mp2an(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, cmul, c2)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  dvdsmul1(c0, c2)
  mp3an(wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, cmul, c2)), wn(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, c3)))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c3, clt, c0)))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  nnzi(c0)
  nn0zi(c2)
  zmulcl(c0, c2)
  pm3.2i(wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c3, clt, c0))
  ndvdsadd(co(c0, cmul, c2), c0, c3)
  breq2i(c0, cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, c3), c1)
}
